name: Trafiklab DialogFlow/Google Assistant Demo
description: A demo application showing how to use the Trafiklab SDKs to build a Google Assistant application

APP_DATAPROVIDER.description: The data provider to use. Choose between 'SL' or 'RESROBOT' without the ''.

RESROBOT_TIMETABLE_KEY.description: Your API key for the Trafiklab ResRobot - Stolptidtabeller 2 API. You can leave this empty, but some features may not work.

RESROBOT_ROUTEPLANNING_KEY.description: Your API key for the Trafiklab ResRobot Reseplanerare API. You can leave this empty, but some features may not work.

SL_TIMETABLE_KEY.description: Your API key for the Trafiklab SL Realtidsinformation 4 API. You can leave this empty, but some features may not work.

SL_ROUTEPLANNING_KEY.description: Your API key for the Trafiklab SL Reseplanerare 3.1 API. You can leave this empty, but some features may not work.

SL_STATIONLOOKUP_KEY.description: Your API key for the Trafiklab SL Platsuppslag API. You can leave this empty, but some features may not work.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: This option is required to redirect log output to Heroku.

APP_USER_AGENT.description: The user agent to use when making requests to Trafiklab.
